intro

my intention with this bot is to let people aware of the amazing and diverse music that siinamota has made, have new people discover his music, and so we (fans) can get bits of his art in our timelines ‚ù§

please be respectful about siinamota when interacting with the bot. i am not afraid of using the block button!

you can contact me at meow@doqmeat.com for anything

changelog

i might be studying computer science but idk how most of this works. elon musk fucking sucks so i've been fighting for my life to get this bot running throughout it's course.

23.may.24 v5 - running using gimmickbots

22.feb.24 v4 - now running using bots.agori.dev by GulioIsStupid thank god

20.apr.23 v3 - i use GuglioIs2Stupid‚Äôs (twitter link is dead) CBDQ Python template and host it via replit.com

07.apr.23 v2 - using microsoft power automate to run the bot thanks to this turorial!

16.jun.23 v1 - bot first created running on CBDQ (cheap bots done quick)

formating

  • new song additions to the bot will be announced while the hourly bot will always have a üåü (star) emoji
  • all song clips have their respective source embedded in the tweet in form of a youtube or nicovideo link
    • 10.may.23 - i no longer have access to twitter media studio (its behind a paywall) meaning new songs added to the twitter bot will not have links embed in the video. to compensate for this, i will have a link to the song under the source tweet of the clip.

videos used in my tweets

i will always try to upload the original song video or PV (meaning without eng subtitles) but sometimes it is hard to come across them which is why some videos have eng subtitles and some of them dont. if theres any problem with the original uploader with me using clips of their translation videos, i will gladly remove them and find another way of uploading the song.

  • shoutout to the vocaloid database!!!! the site has been in credibly helpful throughout the making of this bot
  • siinamota discord server i‚Äôm in that have also helped me out <3
